text: F.C. Lokomotiv Moscow (FC Lokomotiv Moskva, , ) is a Russian football club from Moscow. They won the Russian Premier League three times and the Russian Cup seven times. ==Achievements== ===Domestic competitions=== *Soviet Top League / Russian Premier League: 3 :: 2001, 2003, 2017 **Runners-up (7): 1958, 1994, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2018, 2019 *Soviet Cup / Russian Cup: 10 :: 1936, 1956, 1995, 1996, 1999, 2000, 2006, 2014, 2016, 2018 **Runners-up (2): 1989, 1997 *Russian Super Cup: 3 :: 2002, 2004, 2018 *Soviet First League: 3 :: 1946, 1963, 1973 **Runners-up (2): 1970, 1986 ===International competitions=== *UEFA Cup Winners' Cup **Semi-finalists (2): 1997, 1998 * Commonwealth of Independent States Cup: 1 ::2004 **Runners-up: none *European Railways Cup: 5 ::1973, 1975, 1978, 1982, 1986 **Runners-up (1): 1962 ==References== Category:Russian football clubs Category:Moscow Category:1923 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: FC Lokomotiv Moscow
